Origin: From this point on, I will call you by your name, and I'll always be with you.

Name: Ferry
Origin: So please accept this gift.

Name: Ferry
Origin: From now on your name will be...
Peace returns to the ruins, and [Djeeta] and the crew stop by the town at Ferry's request.
Ferry, who wanted to visit the town's tailor, shyly steps out in front of the crew wearing a new outfit.

Name: Ferry
Origin: What do you think? It looks okay, right?

Name: Lyria
Origin: Better than okay! It really suits you, Ferry!

Name: Ferry
Origin: Thanks, Lyria. This is the first outfit I've ever chosen by myself.

Name: Ferry
Origin: While I lived on the island, I only wore clothes my parents chose for me.

Name: Ferry
Origin: Those clothes are obviously still important to me, but...

Name: Ferry
Origin: I've changed a lot since I left. I wanted something a bit more grown-up.
It's very cute.
Yeah, you're all grown-up all right.

Name: Ferry
Origin: You think so? Thank you, [Djeeta].

Name: Ferry
Origin: Though it is a little embarrassing when you're all direct like that.

Name: Ferry
Origin: Hey. That's not a very captain-like response!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Was that really necessary, [Djeeta]?
[Djeeta] gives a mischievous grin in response.

Name: Ferry
Origin: Um... So I guess you at least don't mind my new outfit...

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Anyway! Now that we're done here, let's get back to the airship.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Yeah! We have a bunch of stuff to pick up on the way back after all.

Name: Ferry
Origin: Okay, let's go.

Name: Ferry
Origin: Come on, Momo. And the rest of you.

Name: Momo
Origin: Rawr!
Ferry's ghost pets, who were playing nearby, gather around her.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: You know, I'm still surprised that the so-called evil spirit is coming with us.

Name: Lyria
Origin: I'm surprised too—surprised at how cute he is!

Name: Momo
Origin: Rawr!

Name: Ferry
Origin: Hehe... Momo says he's rugged and handsome, not cute.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Hah! Fair enough. Okay, Momo! You're handsomely cute!

Name: Momo
Origin: Rawr!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Well, there ain't anymore evil spirits in the ruins, so that's a job well done!

Name: Ferry
Origin: Yes. And now Momo will never degenerate back into an evil form again.

Name: Ferry
Origin: After all, he has us now. Just like I have [Djeeta] and the rest of you.
Ferry takes [Djeeta]'s hand and smiles.
Having made a new friend, albeit a slightly strange one, [Djeeta] and the crew continue their journey with yet another member aboard the Grandcypher.

Momo has trouble getting along with Ferry's other ghost pets. When Ferry and the crew find the thieves they've been asked to catch, Ferry encourages Momo to show the other ghosts what he can do to gain their acceptance.
Ferry's ghost pets are frolicking in an especially cheery patch of forest.

Name: Momo
Origin: Rawr!

Origin: Rawr!

Origin: Rawr!

Origin: Hmm... Looks like it could take a while before Momo finally fits in.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Hehe... It'll be okay. I'm sure they'll all be friends eventually!

Name: Ferry
Origin: Yeah... Good thing we have a lot of time.

Name: Ferry
Origin: We can do it at our own pace, can't we, Momo?

Name: Momo
Origin: Rawr...

Name: Ferry
Origin: Don't worry. You're all birds of a feather, so you'll find a way to fly together...

Name: Lyria
Origin: Birds of a feather?

Name: Ferry
Origin: Yeah. Remember how I told you that I met these guys after I was already a ghost?

Name: Ferry
Origin: At that time, none of these four had a name, so I gave one to each of them.

Name: Ferry
Origin: And you know what's funny? I'd already forgotten my own name by then.

Name: Ferry
Origin: But because they were there for me, even though I couldn't remember my name, I rediscovered myself.

Name: Ferry
Origin: We all have that in common. That's what I meant by birds of a feather.

Name: Lyria
Origin: Oh, I get it now.
[Djeeta] and the crew advance through the forest, occasionally stopping to play with Ferry's ghost pets.
Thieves have recently been spotted in the forest, so the crew has taken a request to apprehend them.

Name: Ferry
Origin: What a peaceful forest. It's hard to believe there are thieves around here.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: You know, they attacked that researcher, but they only took his stuff.

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Maybe they aren't all that danger—
Hey! Stop right there! You're skyfarers, right?

Name: Lyria
Origin: Um, yes?

Name: Thief 1
Origin: Oho! Then we're the thieves you're looking for!

Name: Thief 2
Origin: Forget stealing money! All we wanna take is your lives!

Name: Vyrn
Origin: Whoa! These guys seem way more brutal than the request let on!

Name: Ferry
Origin: And they seem to have been waiting for us. Maybe they heard about the bounty on their heads.

Origin: This is your big chance, Momo. Show Beppo and the others how strong you are, and they'll have to accept you!
